page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Half the children under 12 go to Guides,Brownies,Cubs or Scouts in Inchture or Longforgan.Older people go to Youth Club,Mens Club or S.W.R.I which are all held in the school.The membership has declined in he past 20 years as people now have T.V and transport to the town where there are bigger and better clubs.Some of the clubs people go to that are outside our area are Perth Harriers,Ballet School,Dundee Karate Club,Balbeggie Pony Club and Carse of Gowrie Young Farmers.Most people have spare time in the evening they go to clubs,read the newspaper,watch T.V,do the gardening, draw,cycle,play games,knit,sew,D.I.Y, stamp collect,have forty winks,read, feed pets and lots of other things. Parents on average have 71 hours per week leisuire time.Children on average have 56 hours per week lesiure time.
